name: White Dragon Wyrmling
speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
